title: Which country has the biggest Internet population? - Quora

response.answer_text: Internet has stemmed into the roots of our routine lives, and it has become a basic necessity. It is necessary for social media, for work and lots of other things. It has become such a mainstream thing that you can find people using it everywhere; you will see them holding their devices in hands and using the web to watch videos, reading articles, listening to music and playing games.  China is known to be the country with most internet users in the entire world. There are around 772 million web users in China which is indeed a huge number. Why is the number so high in China? The answer is because they have a massive population. As per the China Internet Network Information Center’s 2018 report, 40.47 percent of consumers were increased this year as compared to the previous year. Out of those 772 million individuals, most of them use mobile and very less people use desktop computers and tablets; about 753 million people use the web on mobile. The second one in the list of nations with most internet consumers is India, according to the 2017’s stats; India has more than 462.12 million people who use the web, which is increasing day by day. In the urban areas, its penetration rate is 64.84 percent; however, it is 18 percent in rural areas of India. Male uses the web more than the females in the country. From its total users, 70 percent are male consumers, and 30 percent are female consumers.  With the advancement of technology, the ratio of Americans who use the web is increasing. The rate is getting increased over time as different means of connection are being introduced. So, people from everywhere are adopting the internet in the United States. In November 2017, a survey was conducted by National Telecommunications and Information Administration which revealed that most of the country’s households are using mobile data instead of broadband networks.

Internet has become a part of our lives now. It touches us so often that mankind can stop if it stops getting it's internet dose daily. Social media, news, entertainment, games and everything else that we can think of. Positive use of the Internet makes our lives easy and simple. The Internet provides us useful data, information, and knowledge for personal, social and economic development and it is up to us to utilize our time on the world wide web in a productive manner. Talking about countries with highest number of interest users, China currently has close to 1 Billion active internet users, making it the biggest Internet population. China is followed by India and USA with about 600 Million and 320 Million internet users respectively. Other countries with more than 100 Million internet population include Brazil, Indonesia, Japan, Nigeria and Russia.
